content.raw: PS: I'd suggest some form of automated testing e.g. having the vehicle drive around in loops might expose this.
content.html: PS: I'd suggest some form of automated testing e.g. having the vehicle drive around in loops might expose this.

content.raw: Thanks for the bug report. I'm going to remove Nathan from the assignee though. We now use assignees for only when someone is actively working on the fix. This way, it will be left open to anyone with time to look into it.
content.html: Thanks for the bug report. I'm going to remove Nathan from the assignee though. We now use assignees for only when someone is actively working on the fix. This way, it will be left open to anyone with time to look into it.

content.raw:
I've observed intermittent seg-faults in the heightmap regression test HeightmapTest.Heights. I'm not sure if this is the same seg-fault, but I'm putting the backtraces here.

To reproduce:
~~~
while test/regression/heightmap ; do date; done
~~~

It reaches the second test (Heights)
~~~
[ RUN      ] HeightmapTest.Heights
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.67
Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.11 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
Segmentation fault (core dumped)

content.html:
I've observed intermittent seg-faults in the heightmap regression test HeightmapTest.Heights. I'm not sure if this is the same seg-fault, but I'm putting the backtraces here.

To reproduce:

while test/regression/heightmap ; do date; done

It reaches the second test (Heights)

[ RUN      ] HeightmapTest.Heights
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345

Segmentation fault (core dumped)

Here's a backtrace:

content.raw: Problem on the regression test end. It's calling calling PreRender in parallel to the main rendering read which is bad, so closing the issue
content.html: Problem on the regression test end. It's calling calling PreRender in parallel to the main rendering read which is bad, so closing the issue

content.raw: I'm marking it as on hold, since there is a problem with the regression test that we should fix.
content.html: I'm marking it as on hold, since there is a problem with the regression test that we should fix.
